articles.title: PMS Vs Early Pregnancy: How To Spot The Difference - Health Digest
articles.description: It can sometimes be hard to tell the difference between premenstrual syndrome and early pregnancy. Here are some of the signs and symptoms to look out for.
articles.content: Breast tenderness, mood swings, cramps, constipation, and fatigue are just a few of the various symptoms that both PMS and early pregnancy can have in common with one another, according to experts at… [+973 chars]
